title: Eucerin Lotion, Intensive Repair, 16.9 Ounce Bottle
Nature's Gate Glow Lotion, medium skin tones, 16 Ounce Bottle
description: Nature's Gate Glow Lotion for medium skin tones provides a gradual, even and natural looking glow while hydrating and nourishing skin. Skin protecting antioxidants are combined with 7 skin conditioning moisturizers, leaving skin supple and touchably soft. Use daily for healthy looking, sun-kissed skin year round.

title: Garnier Olia Oil Powered Permanent Haircolor, 7.0 Dark Blonde
description: Unlike traditional hair color, olia uses an exclusive 60% oil blend, with natural flower oils in the colorant. The unique oil-based formula propels colorants deep into the hair without ammonia, for pure, vivid, long-lasting color. Olia achieves maximum color performance while the oils help reverse roughness and dullness, visibly improving and restoring hair.
